excerpt: "The latest is Buick which on Friday at Auto Guangzhou 2021 unveiled the Smart Pod concept. The concept is a self-driving minivan based on General Motors' Ultium dedicated electric-vehicle platform, and Buick envisions it being used not only for transport but also as a private space to relax,"
